actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the first $5,000 of an individual's civil service retirement annuity (or other Federal retirement annuity) shall be exempt from income tax.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income up to $5,000 of an individual's civil service retirement annuity.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the first $5,000 of an individual's civil service retirement annuity (or other Federal retirement annuity) shall be exempt from income tax.
